TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ReadyHandler(object o, ReadyArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ReadyHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ReadyHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ReadyHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ReadyHandler is removed from the event.
